Comments_List: Various advanced topics in evolutionary genetics.

The course development is flexible which allows us to focus on what we are interested in and be more useful for each of us. It will be better to have more students or people with different research interest coming in.

I would recommend this course to graduate students who may use any sorts of evolutionary genetics in their own research. This may not be a suitable course if someone is looking for a systematic review of basic evolutionary genetics but surely included a lot of advanced and research-directed topics. It also provided the opportunity to present our own thoughts and to share ideas among fellows.
